item.title: 【Requests】[REQ AUD] - Vukovi - Discography [Lossless: FLAC 16Bit]
item.description:
It is exactly what it says, theres a band called Vukovi, I'm looking for their four albums, Vukovi [2017], Fall Better [2020], NULA [2022], and My God Has Got A Gun [2025], as well as the standalone singles Creep Heat and Mercy Kill [both 2023]. Anything else is optional from them [they have a couple EP's from before the debut album] because I'm not certain if they exist in a lossless format.

All in FLAC 16-Bit/44.1kHz.(most recent album is available places in 28bit/48kHz, I'll leave it up to whoever takes the request on whether to rip/find 16 bit or spring for the 24bit].

Source can be anywhere you can get or rip a genuine 16 bit flac of these albums but most people seem to like Qobuz here so I put I put the Qobuz link in.

https://www.qobuz.com/ca-en/interpreter/vukovi/1937615
item.author: ALAROSE
